amendment.description: Amendments en bloc consist of the text of amendments numbered 2, 8, 9 (modified), 10, 12 (modified), 16 (modified), 17, 19 (modified), 20, 24, 25, 27 (modified), 28 (modified), 29 (modified), 31, 34 (modified), 41 (modified), 43 (modified), 45 (modified), and 46 printed on pages H6008-H6011 in the Congressional Record for June 15, 1995.
amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of several amendments printed in Part 2 of House Rept. 104-136 as amendment Nos. 2, 8, 9 (modified), 10, 12 (modified), 16 (modified), 17, 19 (modified), 20, 24, 25, 27 (modified), 28 (modified), 29 (modified), 31, 34 (modified), 41 (modified), 43 (modified), 45 (modified), and 46.

action.text: On agreeing to the Spence amendments (A015) Agreed to by recorded vote: 411 - 14 (Roll no. 383).
